Played this game for the first time in 2019, and to put things straight, this game still holds. The depth of the story line is immense and, if one care more for gameplay than pretty graphics this is the game for you. 5/5 stars, a top tier game.

Such a classic

This is a classic. It has aged quite a bit, but I don't think that age has ruined the enjoyment of this game. I personally love the late nineties feel of this and many other games. It may be difficult for many initially to get past the dated graphics, however once you do, there is an enjoyable experience to be had, even if it does falter near the end.

muito bom

I was a little skeptical at first. I began this universe playing the portal games, and once I figured out Half-Life was in the same universe, I realized I needed to play it. Honestly speaking, this was one of the best games I ever played. As a creative person myself, I enjoy games with excellent story lines. This story was unique and awesome. I'm impressed with the creators of the game. I'm actually just about to jump into Half-Life 2, so I have high hopes for the next few Half-Life games thanks to an awesome first one.
it is enjoyable, but I'd get it during a sale

This is one of those games, that, although has some problems, has withstand the test of time. Gun-gameplay is fast and feels satisfying, varying amount of weapons, decent light puzzle solving, killer soundtrack, and gets a good balance of both action and horror.
It hasn't aged like wine, though. Movement feels a bit slippery, which isn't the best, when it comes to platforming, and the difficulty tends to swing, everywhere. Also, there are far too many moments to count, where taking damage isn't really an option, mainly by fall damage.
Minus those things, it's an alright game, worth checking out.

El juego que lo inicio todo para mí. 
Recuerdo tener seis años y no entender bien todavía el increíble juego que tenia delante. Prestando atención a la introducción en el tren, escuchando los diálogos para así quedar sorprendido por la catástrofe que da comienzo al juego.
Un clásico que no puede faltar en tu biblioteca de Steam, cada algunos años vuelvo a jugarlo y parece que viajo a mi infancia otra vez.

I loved this game after beating it for the first time! That was a year ago . It has a lot of action and an interesting story. There is a great variety of weapons to use. The graphics were fantastic for its time and still look great now. The only issue I ran into was that some of the ally NPCs struggled to follow me. That is really my only negative which is really a gripe. Overall, this is a great game. I'm already playing Half-life 2 and so far having a great time with it.
Old but gold. Runs best on my laptop. Still one of my favourites.
